item.title: endlessh Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to a lack of upstream development, we have decided to deprecate our endlessh container.
item.content: Due to a lack of upstream development, we have decided to deprecate our endlessh container.

item.title: New Container: Endlessh
item.description: We have released a new container for Endlessh! Endlessh is an SSH tarpit that very slowly sends an endless, random SSH banner. It keeps SSH clients locked up for hours or even days at a time. The purpose is to put your real SSH server on another port and then let the script kiddies get stuck in this tarpit instead of bothering a real server.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Endlessh!

Endlessh is an SSH tarpit that very slowly sends an endless, random SSH banner. It keeps SSH clients locked up for hours or even days at a time. The purpose is to put your real SSH server on another port and then let the script kiddies get stuck in this tarpit instead of bothering a real server.
